Author: TheFalseProfit#5929
Content: Download the 10.9GB file. Use 7-zip to unzip. I then used Winrar to  unzip the next bit. Move  or copy the two folders to the komodo folder in C:\Users\YOUR USER NAME\AppData\Roaming\Komodo overwriting the original folders. %appdata%komodo may also get you there.
